original_text: But the house was full of people and they could not get in. So they carried the man onto the flat roof of the house. Then they made a hole in the roof. After that, they put the mat down through the hole. The man was still lying on it. He came down in the middle of the crowd, in front of Jesus.
korean_text: 무리 때문에 메고 들어갈 길을 얻지 못한지라 지붕에 올라가 기와를 벗기고 병자를 침상째 무리 가운데로 예수 앞에 달아 내리니

sentences.original_text: But the house was full of people
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 집은 사람들로 가득 차 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and they could not get in

sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그 남자를 들고 올라갔습니다

sentences.original_text: onto the flat roof of the house
After that, they put the mat down
The man was still lying on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자는 여전히 그 위에 누워 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: in the middle of the crowd
